snippet.title: Damsel - Nintendo Switch and Xbox One Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Damsel,  the  vampire  slaying  arcade  game  from  Screwtape  Studios, is now available on Nintendo Switch™ and Xbox One.

Cause distress in this fast-paced, challenging action platformer! Speed through dozens of missions as Special Agent Damsel, the first and last line of defence against the seedy world of corporate vampires.

Rescue hostages, disarm bombs, hack servers and dispatch the undead with precision, speed, and style. Balance frenetic action with split second choices, and pay attention, you never know where the next vamp will come from.

Check us out:

🔹 Nintendo Switch™: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/damsel-switch/
🔹 Xbox One: http://www.microsoft.com/p/damsel/9pn2csgw99vn
🔹 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/452410/
🔹 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DamselGame/
🔹 Twitter: https://twitter.com/DamselGame
🔹Website: www.damselgame.net
